Simple Example

Charles Champney Carey

2018-04-19

Source: vignettes/monarchr-simple-ex.Rmd

monarchr-simple-ex.Rmd

Replicate the 11 tabs from Monarch Initiative that result from a search on a human gene.

Here are a couple of them for now.

We load the monarchr client and the DT libraries.

(DT is the datatables package which we use to display the results.)

library(monarchr)
library(DT)
gene <- "NCBIGene:8314"
homs <- bioentity_homologs(gene)
dis <- bioentity_disease_assoc_w_gene(gene)
datatable(homs$homologs)
datatable(dis$diseases)

Developed by Charles C Carey, Ted Laderas.
